title: Judicator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player during the day to force them to transcend humanity tonight. (3 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player that transcends humanity is entitled to all of the following effects:
> - Abilities that resolve at the beginning of the night (e.g. Jailor, Pirate) will fail.
> - Anything that should happen to them tonight will not - all kills will fail, all visits will fail, all abilities will fail. This cannot be overridden.
> - The first time a player transcends humanity, all negative effects on them will be purged (e.g. ice marks, douses, hexes).
> - They will gain all immunities while transcending.
- You may not force yourself to transcend humanity.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: ~~Transcend humanity.~~ Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

desc:
Post 639
*Well, I'm off to commit several crimes against humanity. Au revior!*
